title: 关于萤石的翻译
author: hukk
txt_content:
When placing redstone on a glowstone block it can send power down but not up the block, since there is a glitch because it is registered in the coding as "glass".


有人知道是什么意思吗？

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 怎么会send power down but not up。。。不是相反么。。。

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
geludan 发表于 2012-8-28 22:18 
怎么会send power down but not up。。。不是相反么。。。
就是……
蛋疼？
表示玩过红石的都知道这东西是能做向上传输电路的

replies.author: hukk
replies.txt_content: 自己试验了一下大概也懂了，萤石是透明方块不会阻断红石，同时又可以在上面放红石
